org.assertj.core.internal

类 Conditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.internal.Conditions

  • public class Conditions
extends Object
    Verifies that a value satisfies a Condition.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T> void assertDoesNotHave(AssertionInfo info, T actual, Condition<? super T> condition)
      Asserts that the actual value does not satisfy the given Condition.
      <T> void assertHas(AssertionInfo info, T actual, Condition<? super T> condition)
      Asserts that the actual value satisfies the given Condition.
      <T> void assertIs(AssertionInfo info, T actual, Condition<? super T> condition)
      Asserts that the actual value satisfies the given Condition.
      <T> void assertIsNot(AssertionInfo info, T actual, Condition<? super T> condition)
      Asserts that the actual value does not satisfy the given Condition.
      void assertIsNotNull(Condition<?> condition)
      Asserts the the given Condition is not null.
      void assertIsNotNull(Condition<?> condition, String format, Object... args)
      Asserts the the given Condition is not null.
      static Conditions instance()
      Returns the singleton instance of this class.

    • 方法详细资料

      • instance

        public static Conditions instance()
        Returns the singleton instance of this class.
        返回:
        the singleton instance of this class.

      • assertIs

        public <T> void assertIs(AssertionInfo info,
                         T actual,
                         Condition<? super T> condition)
        Asserts that the actual value satisfies the given Condition.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the actual value and the type of values that given Condition takes.
        参数:
        info - contains information about the assertion.
        actual - the actual value.
        condition - the given Condition.
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the given Condition is null.
        AssertionError - if the actual value does not satisfy the given Condition.

      • assertIsNot

        public <T> void assertIsNot(AssertionInfo info,
                            T actual,
                            Condition<? super T> condition)
        Asserts that the actual value does not satisfy the given Condition.
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the actual value and the type of values that given Condition takes.
        参数:
        info - contains information about the assertion.
        actual - the actual value.
        condition - the given Condition.
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the given Condition is null.
        AssertionError - if the actual value satisfies the given Condition.

        public void assertIsNotNull(Condition<?> condition)

      • assertIsNotNull

        public void assertIsNotNull(Condition<?> condition,
                            String format,
                            Object... args)
        Asserts the the given Condition is not null.
        参数:
        condition - the given Condition.
        format - as in String.format(String, Object...)
        args - as in String.format(String, Object...)
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - if the given Condition is null.
